activities: Investigation and analysis of incidents of pharmaceutical counterfeiting and related activities, formulation and implementation of anti-counterfeiting strategies and/or communications with governmental regulatory or law enforcement personnel or legal counsel.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The International Centre for Dispute Resolution of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) at www.adr.org will provide independent dispute resolution.
